thread.title: Nice, Quaint & close to Eurostar
thread.title_full: Nice, Quaint & close to Eurostar - Review of Hotel Hor, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Notating53
title: Nice, Quaint & close to Eurostar
text: Walking distance from the station of the Eurostar. Everything modern. Good breakfast not included but additional in cost. Friendly, unknowable front desk staff. The young man was clueless about Paris's things to do at night. He didnt even know about Uber. Front staff person prepared & brought room service to our room. Good for a day or two stay. Space is small but bigger than NYC hotels.
